introduction.standoutPhrase: Turning ideas into digital solutions with clean and efficient code.

aboutMe.title: ABOUT-ME
aboutMe.messageContentDescription: My name is Erick, I'm 19 years old, and I've been studying programming for 4 years. During this time, I have fully dedicated myself to web development, both Frontend and Backend. My current goal is to continue improving my skills as a developer, gaining experience, and remaining open to new opportunities in the market.
